name: Pandemonium (GiovanBuiatti)
description:
PANDEMONIUM

This project is a 2D platformer created during my first year in ETPA Montpellier

Silver is having a near death experience. A thug during his lifetime, his soul finds itself in limbo, a gloomy and oppressive place. However his time has not come and in order to find the mortal world, as soon as he arrives , he will have to fight agaisnt his regrets which haunt him, they are represented by the ghosts of the people who have been impacted by his misdeeds, to ultimately defeat the Guardian of Death.
